cards.name: Strength
cards.upright: Courage, patience, inner power. The lion represents the strength to overcome challenges through gentle but firm determination.
cards.reversed: Self-doubt, impulse, need for compassion. When reversed, this card suggests inner weakness or the need to find balance between strength and gentleness.
cards.description: The Strength card shows a lion being gently tamed by a figure, representing the power of inner strength over brute force.

cards.name: The Fool
cards.upright: Beginnings, spontaneity, free spirit. The butterfly represents new adventures and the joy of starting fresh.
cards.reversed: Hesitation, risk without plan. When reversed, this card warns against reckless behavior or being too naive.
cards.description: The Fool card shows a butterfly beginning its journey, representing the start of a new adventure with an open heart.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.upright: Focus, resourcefulness, action. The fox represents the ability to manifest desires through skill and determination.
cards.reversed: Scattered effort, manipulation, delays. When reversed, this card suggests misuse of power or lack of focus.
cards.description: The Magician card shows a fox with all the tools needed to create magic, representing the power to manifest your desires.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.upright: Intuition, mystery, inner knowledge. The owl represents the wisdom that comes from within and the mysteries of the subconscious.
cards.reversed: Lack of inner voice, repressed intuition. When reversed, this card suggests ignoring your inner wisdom or being too secretive.
cards.description: The High Priestess card shows an owl in the moonlight, representing the deep wisdom and intuition that lies within us all.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.upright: Authority, structure, leadership. The eagle represents the power of leadership and the ability to create order from chaos.
cards.reversed: Tyranny, rigidity, lack of discipline. When reversed, this card suggests abuse of power or being too controlling.
cards.description: The Emperor card shows an eagle soaring high, representing the power of leadership and the ability to see the big picture.
